PreferenceScreen.android:title: Launcher Changer Menu
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Choose between 4x5 or 5x5 Drawer Grid.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Use 4x5 Launcher
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Need no reboot, but you can reboot to upgrade app properly.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Use 5x5 Launcher
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Need no reboot, but you can reboot to upgrade app properly.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: SystemUI Position Changer
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Choose between SystemUI Stock or Left Signal.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Signal Stock Position
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Rom control will install it and reboot the UI\n[MANUAL REBOOT RECOMMENDED!]

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Signal Left Position (iPhone Style)
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Rom control will install it and reboot the UI\n[MANUAL REBOOT RECOMMENDED!]

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Build.prop Changer Menu
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Choose between different build.prop configs.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: S4 Product Name Build.prop
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Rom control will install it and reboot automatically\n[Phone will reboot after press this option]

PreferenceScreen.android:title: S6 Product Name Build.prop
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Rom control will install it and reboot automatically\n[Phone will reboot after press this option]

PreferenceScreen.android:title: S4 Product Name and MultiUser Support
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Rom control will install it and reboot automatically\n[Phone will reboot after press this option]

PreferenceScreen.android:title: S6 Product Name and MultiUser Support
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Rom control will install it and reboot automatically\n[Phone will reboot after press this option]

PreferenceScreen.android:title: KeyLayout Chooser Menu
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Choose between S4 stock keylayout or s6 keylayout.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Activate S4 Keylayout
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Rom control will install it and reboot automatically\n[Phone will reboot after press this option]

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Activate S6 Keylayout
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Rom control will install it and reboot automatically\n[Phone will reboot after press this option]

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Emoji Changer Menu
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Choose between different Emoji Icons.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Install Google Emojis
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Reboot is required for changes to take effect

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Install Samsung Emojis
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Reboot is required for changes to take effect

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Install IOS Emojis
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Reboot is required for changes to take effect

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Install Lollipop Emojis
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Reboot is required for changes to take effect

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Wifi Backup/Restore Menu
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Backup and Restore your wifi accounts.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Backup Wifi Accounts
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Backup your wpa_supplicant.conf file.\n(sdcard/backups_romcontrol)

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Restore Wifi Accounts
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Restore your wpa_supplicant.conf file from backup\n[Phone will reboot after press this option]

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Audio Gain Table Menu
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Choose between different Sound configurations.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Normal Sound Audio
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Change you Audio configuration to 'Default'\n[Phone will reboot after press this option]

PreferenceScreen.android:title: High Sound Audio
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Change you Audio configuration to 'High'\n[Phone will reboot after press this option]

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Low Sound Audio
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Change you Audio configuration to 'Low'\n[Phone will reboot after press this option]

PreferenceScreen.android:title: System Sounds Menu
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Enable or Disable different System Sounds like, boot, charging, etc.

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Enable Boot Sound
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Reboot is required for changes to take effect

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Disable Boot Sound
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Reboot is required for changes to take effect

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Enable Charging Sound
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Reboot is required for changes to take effect

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Disable Charging Sound
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Reboot is required for changes to take effect

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Enable Volume Sound when pressed
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Reboot is required for changes to take effect

PreferenceScreen.android:title: Disable Volume Sound when pressed
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Reboot is required for changes to take effect
